Sentencas: Many studies have been performed dealing with the processing conditions of electrodes and electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: However, the processing of the interconnector material has received less attention.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: Lanthanum chromite (LaCrO(3)) is probably the most studied material as SOFCs interconnector.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: This paper deals with the rheology and casting behaviour of lanthanum chromite based materials to produce interconnectors for SOFCs.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: A powder with the composition La(0.80)Sr(0.20)Cr(0.92)CO(0).(08)O(3) was obtained by combustion synthesis.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: Aqueous suspensions were prepared to solids loading ranging from 8 to 17.5 vol.%, using ammonium polyacrylate (PAA) as dispersant and tetramethylammonium hydroxide (TMAH) to assure a basic pH and providing stabilization.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: The influence of the additives concentrations and suspension ball milling time were studied.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: Suspensions prepared with 24 h ball milling, with 3 wt.% and 1 wt.% of PAA and TMAH, respectively, yielded the best conditions for successful slip casting.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC

Sentencas: Sintering of the green discs was performed in air at 1600 degrees C for 4 h leading to relatively dense materials.
Titulo: Fabrication of Sr- and Co-doped lanthanum chromite interconnectors for SOFC
